summary: **Peppa Pig** is a British animated TV show for preschoolers. It started in 2004 and follows Peppa, a little pig, and her family and friends, who are different animals. The show has had many voice actors for Peppa, including Harley Bird for 13 years. Hasbro now owns the show and has renewed it until 2027. It's been sold in over 180 countries and is one of Hasbro's most popular brands.
title: Peppa Pig
